      • setDbAccess

        public void setDbAccess​(DbAccess db)
        This method sets the database access.
        Parameters:
        db - Database to use for data extraction.

      • getTransazioni

        public java.util.List<TableData.TupleData> getTransazioni​(java.lang.String table)
                                                   throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method returns a list of TupleData where every element of the list is a tuple from the database.
        Parameters:
        table - Name of the table from the database used to extract data from.
        Returns:
        List of TupleData where every element is a tuple from the database.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws a SQLException in case a SQL error occurs.

      • getDistinctColumnValues

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getDistinctColumnValues​(java.lang.String table,
                                                                TableSchema.Column column)
                                                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method returns a list of all values assumed by a specific attribute (in case this attribute is discrete).
        Parameters:
        table - Name of the table from the database to query.
        column - Column (attribute) of the table used to extract its distinct values.
        Returns:
        List of all values assumed by the attribute.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws a SQLException in case a SQL error occurs.

      • getAggregateColumnValue

        public java.lang.Object getAggregateColumnValue​(java.lang.String table,
                                                TableSchema.Column column,
                                                QUERY_TYPE aggregate)
                                         throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                                NoValueException
        This method returns the aggregate values assumed by a specific attribute (in case this attribute is continuous).
        Parameters:
        table - Name of the table from the database to query.
        column - Column (attribute) of the table used to extract its aggregate values.
        aggregate - Enumeration of minimum and maximum values.
        Returns:
        An aggregation of values.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws a SQLException in case a SQL error occurs.
        NoValueException - Throws a NoValueException in case there's a null continuous value in the column.
